alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Middlesex; Norfolk; Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 9:12AM EDT until August 18 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Norfolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Suffolk County in eastern Massachusetts... East central Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... Northwestern Plymouth County in southeastern Massachusetts... Northwestern Bristol County in southeastern Massachusetts... Northeastern Providence County in Rhode Island... * Until 1015 AM EDT. * At 912 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mansfield, or near North Attleborough, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Brockton, Quincy, Newton, Somerville, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Taunton, Weymouth, Revere, Arlington, Everett, Braintree, Chelsea, Cumberland, Randolph, Watertown, and Needham. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
